name: Ivory_Bonded_Leather_Swivel_Glider_Recliner
description:
This contemporary design accent chair combines 3 functional elements. It swivels, it glides and it reclines, ensuring that you are always in a comfortable position. This ivory bonded leather chair comes with padded head and arm rests, designed for ultimate comfort. The easy glide motion and the contemporary design makes it a multi-functional and fashionable addition for your den, bedroom, living room or basement.

Set includes: One (1) reclinerMaterials: Bonded leather, pine, plywoodFinish: IvoryUpholstery color: IvorySeat dimensions: 21 inches high x 20 inches wide x 8 inches longDimensions: 40 inches high x 29 inches wide x 36 inches longStyleContemporaryMaterialBonded LeatherChair TypeReclinersAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorOff-WhiteFurniture PatternSolidProduct FeaturesSwivel
